title: COMPLETE JOB SEEKER'S GUIDE TO AI PROMPTS & TOOLS
subtitle: Everything You Need to Land Your Dream Job Using AI

SECTION_1_AI_JOB_SEARCH_PLATFORMS.description: All-in-One Platforms with Ready-to-Use AI Prompts for Job Seekers

platforms.name: Teal (tealhq.com)
platforms.description: Complete AI-powered job search platform with free tier
key_benefits: AI Resume Bullet Coach - rewrites bullets with keywords
Job Match Scoring - shows how well you fit each role
Interview Preparation AI - practice with AI interviewer
Free tier generous (no credit card required)
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Optimize resume for each job, track applications, practice interviews all in one place

platforms.name: JobCopilot (jobcopilot.com)
key_benefits: AI Resume Generator - tailored for each role
AI Cover Letter Generator - personalized for each job
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Apply to 50+ jobs daily with personalized cover letters without manual effort

platforms.name: Jobcamp (jobcamp.ai)
platforms.description: AI-powered resume and cover letter tailor-made for each job
key_benefits: Copy job posting link -> Get tailored resume instantly
AI-generated cover letters specific to role
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Spend 2 minutes per job instead of 30 minutes customizing resume and cover letter

platforms.name: CareerFlow (careerflow.ai)
key_benefits: AI Resume Builder with ATS optimization
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Manage entire job search from resume to interview in one platform

platforms.name: Simplify.jobs (simplify.jobs)
platforms.description: Browser extension for job application auto-fill
key_benefits: Works with all major job boards
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Apply to jobs 10x faster with auto-fill functionality

platforms.name: Jobright (jobright.ai)
platforms.description: AI job matching and career copilot
key_benefits: AI algorithm matches you with best-fit jobs
AI Job Coach explains role fit
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Find jobs that match your skills with AI explanations of why they fit

platforms.name: BulkApply (bulkapply.com)
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Apply to hundreds of jobs monthly with minimal effort

platforms.name: LazyApply (lazyapply.com)
key_benefits: Apply to 750+ jobs daily (depending on plan)
platforms.how_it_helps_you: Automate job applications while maintaining personalization

prompts.title: Resume Match Score
prompts.prompt:
Analyze my resume against this job posting and provide:
1. Match score (0-100%)
2. Top 5 missing keywords
3. Experience gaps
4. Specific phrases to incorporate
Format as: Score | Critical Gaps | Keywords

RESUME: [PASTE YOUR RESUME]
JOB POSTING: [PASTE JOB DESCRIPTION]

prompts.title: ATS Optimization
prompts.prompt:
Review my resume for ATS optimization. Identify:
1. Formatting issues that hurt ATS scanning
2. Missing keywords from common job descriptions
3. Weak bullet points that need power words
4. Action verbs to strengthen impact

MY RESUME: [PASTE RESUME]

prompts.title: Bullet Point Rewrite
prompts.prompt:
Rewrite these resume bullets using CAR (Challenge-Action-Result) method and add power verbs:
- [BULLET 1]
- [BULLET 2]
- [BULLET 3]

Make them stronger and more quantifiable.

prompts.title: Tailored Cover Letter
prompts.prompt:
Write a compelling cover letter for this job. Make it:
- Specific to company mission and values
- Highlight relevant skills from my background
- Show enthusiasm for the role
- 3-4 paragraphs, professional tone

JOB DESCRIPTION: [PASTE]
MY BACKGROUND: [DESCRIBE YOUR EXPERIENCE]
COMPANY: [COMPANY NAME]
ROLE: [POSITION TITLE]

prompts.title: Interview Question Practice
prompts.prompt:
I'm interviewing for [JOB TITLE] at [COMPANY].
You're a hiring manager for this role.
Job description: [PASTE DESCRIPTION]

Ask me 8 interview questions mapped to top required skills.
After each answer:
1. Provide STAR method feedback
2. Suggest a stronger version
3. Rate my answer (1-10)

prompts.title: STAR Method Coach
prompts.prompt:
Help me answer this interview question using STAR method:
Question: [PASTE QUESTION]
My experience: [DESCRIBE YOUR BACKGROUND]

Guide me through:
- Situation (provide context)
- Task (what was your role)
- Action (what did you do)
- Result (what happened)

prompts.title: Job Title Discovery
prompts.prompt:
I'm seeking a new job and want to broaden job titles I should consider.
My resume: [PASTE YOUR RESUME]

1. Analyze my skills and experience
2. Ask 3-4 questions about which skills I enjoy
3. Create a table of 15+ job titles matching my profile
4. Explain why each title fits

prompts.title: Boolean Search String
prompts.prompt:
Create a Boolean search string for [JOB BOARD] to find candidates like me:
Desired role: [YOUR TARGET ROLE]
Key skills: [LIST 5-10 SKILLS]
Location: [LOCATION]
Experience: [YEARS]
Education: [DEGREE]

Create search string with:
- Include terms
- Exclude terms
- Location parameters

prompts.title: Skill Gap Analysis
prompts.prompt:
Analyze the skills gap for my target role:
Target role: [JOB TITLE]
Current skills: [LIST YOUR SKILLS]

Provide:
1. Skills I have (strengths)
2. Critical missing skills
3. Nice-to-have skills
4. 90-day learning plan to fill gaps

prompts.title: Salary Negotiation
prompts.prompt:
Help me prepare for salary negotiation:
Role: [JOB TITLE]
Location: [LOCATION]
My experience: [YEARS]
Current salary: [CURRENT]

Provide:
1. Market salary range for this role
2. Negotiation talking points
3. How to present my value
4. Negotiation phrases to use

tasks: Sign up for Teal (free tier)
Sign up for ChatGPT or Claude (free tier)
Copy 10 prompts from FlowGPT for resume optimization
Save prompts to Google Docs for easy access
Build free resume on Rezi.ai
Use ChatGPT prompt: 'Resume Match Score' against 3 target jobs
Rewrite bullets using Claude with provided prompts
Add keywords from job descriptions
Install Simplify.jobs browser extension (free)
Set job preferences in Teal
Customize Jobcamp for 3 target job titles
Create 3 resume versions for different roles
Use ChatGPT 'Tailored Cover Letter' prompt for 5 jobs
Test Jobcamp auto-generation on 3 target jobs
Save templates for easy reuse
Customize with company-specific details
Use Claude for 'Interview Question Practice' prompt
Try Interviewsby.ai free tier (3 questions)
Record yourself answering using STAR method
Get feedback from free AI interview tools
Apply to 20-30 jobs using Simplify.jobs auto-fill
Track all applications in Teal
Use Jobcamp for 5-10 jobs needing customization
Note match scores and skill gaps
Review matched applications in Teal
Identify top skill gaps across jobs
Consider paid tools if free tier not enough
Plan next week's focus areas

tips: Use free tools first before upgrading - most have generous free tiers
Copy prompts from FlowGPT and GitHub for free - no need to pay for prompts
Combine 2-3 free tools (Teal + ChatGPT + Simplify.jobs) for comprehensive coverage
Test paid tools with free trials before committing
Use ChatGPT/Claude basic prompts instead of expensive prompt collections
Track which tools give you best interview conversion rate
Customize applications for 20% of jobs, auto-apply for 80%
Use AI for brainstorming but add personal touch to final submissions
Update your resume weekly based on trending job descriptions
Build your own prompt library from successful applications
